commit.message:
ZipFile.java: Compute the offset of the ZipEntry data correctly.

        * java/util/zip/ZipFile.java: Compute the offset of the ZipEntry
        data correctly.

From-SVN: r30439

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* java/util/zip/ZipFile.java: Compute the offset of the ZipEntry
+	data correctly.
+
